name: Greek Hammer
description:
A game made for the GMTK game jam 2021 with the theme of "Joined Together".

This game is a building/destruction game where you "connect" or build builds and then destroy them.

Sidenote: This is my first game jam and there a lot of things that I wanted to add and didn't get the time to add! Precisely:

1. Bomb exploding animation

2.  Music
